TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XamlTypeMapper extends System.Object

summary.span: Maps a XAML element name to the appropriate CLR in assemblies.

span.span: Maps a XAML element name to the appropriate CLR in assemblies.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬於進階 WPF 案例提供替代的內容，如和。 is part of an advanced WPF scenario that supplies alternate context for and . 針對[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]WPF 應用程式，您應該考慮覆寫針對此案例中，而不是嘗試使用。For [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)] WPF applications, you should consider overriding for this scenario, rather than attempting to use . 可用來提供自訂的對應資訊的應用程式以外的更直接技術透過 XAML 剖析器組件的程式碼的值。 can be used to provide the XAML parser with custom mapping information through a more direct technique than the application of values on the assembly code. 這可能是用來彙總的組件中的所有 CLR 命名空間或參考類型，而不必重新編譯它只是要加入現有組件中的 XAML 就緒屬性設定。This might be useful for consolidation of all CLR namespaces in an assembly, or for referencing types that are XAML-ready in an existing assembly without having to recompile it just to add attributing. 您通常會建立執行個體，以指定屬性值。You typically create a instance in order to specify the property value for a . 接著可用來當做內容呼叫。The in turn can be used as the context for a call. ## 預設對應工具Default Mapper 您可以取得使用預設對應程式靜態屬性。You can obtain a default mapper using the static property. 預設對應工具只適用於預設組件清單。The default mapper only works on a default assembly list. 沒有組件的特定資訊 (如中所指定建構函式) 會使用。No specific information about assemblies (as is specified in constructors) is used.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是程式設計的方式，來加入對應。 is a programmatic way to add a mapping. 例如，下列 XAML 對應指示的不同部分對應的參數:For example, the different parts of the following XAML mapping instruction correspond to the parameters of the : ``` ... ``` `xmlNamespace`已`SDK`，則`clrNamespace`是`Samples`，而`assemblyName`是`SDKSamples`。The `xmlNamespace` is `SDK`, the `clrNamespace` is `Samples`, and the `assemblyName` is `SDKSamples`.

span.span: if the internal type can be accessed; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果未覆寫子類別，由一律會傳回`false`。If not overridden by a subclass, always returns `false`. 當由子類別覆寫時，行為應該是應該會傳回`true`內部型別可以存取，否則如果`false`。When overridden by a subclass, the behavior should be that should return `true` if the internal type can be accessed; otherwise, `false`.

summary.span: Gets an instance of the to use if one has not been specified.

span.span: Gets an instance of the to use if one has not been specified.
The default type mapper.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設對應工具只適用於預設組件清單。The default mapper only works on a default assembly list. 沒有組件的特定資訊 (如中所指定建構函式) 會使用。No specific information about assemblies (as is specified in constructors) is used. 預設組件清單是在目前的實作： `WindowsBase`， `PresentationCore`， `PresentationFramework`。In the current implementation the default assembly list is: `WindowsBase`, `PresentationCore`, `PresentationFramework`. 使用預設對應工具不表示，您完全無法使用自訂組件/類型在 XAML 中。Using the default mapper does not mean that you cannot use custom assemblies/types in XAML at all. 它只表示，如果您使用自訂的類型/組件，您必須再使用傳統的 XAML 技巧，建立做為對應的`xmlns`類型/組件參考位置，而不是型別對應器 API 的每個 XAML 頁面中的屬性。It only means that if you do use custom types/assemblies, you must then use the conventional XAML technique of creating the mappings as `xmlns` attributes in each XAML page where the types/assemblies are referenced, as opposed to a type mapper API. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [XAML 命名空間和命名空間對應 WPF XAML](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-namespaces-and-namespace-mapping-for-wpf-xaml.md)。For more information, see [XAML Namespaces and Namespace Mapping for WPF XAML](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-namespaces-and-namespace-mapping-for-wpf-xaml.md).

summary.span: Gets the CLR that a given XAML element is mapped to, using the specified XML namespace prefix and element name.

span.span: Gets the CLR that a given XAML element is mapped to, using the specified XML namespace prefix and element name.

returns.span: The for the object, or if no mapping could be resolved.

span.span: The for the object, or if no mapping could be resolved.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果型別找不到對應至提供的資訊，`null`會傳回。If a type cannot be found that maps to the provided information, `null` is returned. 不包含前置詞的一部分`localName`。Do not include the prefix as part of `localName`. 針對任何 XAML 元素資訊做為前置詞，區隔到`xmlNamespace`和`localName`這個 API 呼叫的元件。For any prefixed XAML element information, separate it into `xmlNamespace` and `localName` components for this API call.
